item.title: 中国对 "僵尸股 "的痴迷在韩国主题中找到新玩法
item.description: 一些名称与韩国有关的中国题材股跳涨，因为交易商试图在韩国宣布短暂戒严后套现。【原文：A few Chinese meme stocks whose names are related to Korea jumped as traders sought to cash in on a brief declaration of martial law in the nation.】

item.title: 韩国央行承诺在剧变后采取措施保持市场稳定
item.description: 韩国总统宣布戒严数小时后，韩国央行周三承诺采取各种措施保持金融市场稳定。【原文：The Bank of Korea pledged Wednesday to take a variety of steps to keep financial markets stable after the nation’s president declared — and then rescinded — martial law hours earlier.】

item.title: 据称凯雷将重启全球最大水上飞机公司的出售计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在前往马尔代夫旅游的人数恢复之际，以凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：A group of investors led by Carlyle Group Inc. is considering reviving the sale of Trans Maldivian Airways Pvt., people familiar with the matter said, amid a recovery in travel to the island nation.】

item.title: 降息希望让印度股市进入反弹模式
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印尼银行称已准备好进行干预以稳定印尼盾汇率
item.description: 印尼央行表示，在印尼盾徘徊在1美元兑16000印尼盾的心理价位附近时，已准备好干预货币市场，以稳定印尼盾汇率。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank said it was ready to intervene in currency markets to steady the rupiah as it hovers near the psychological level of 16,000 per dollar.】

item.title: 中国科技在华尔街人工智能淘金热中步履蹒跚
item.description: 在今年全球对人工智能的狂热追捧中，中国的主要科技股被甩在了后面，人工智能的实际使用需求不足，再加上地缘政治的压力，它们不太可能很快套现。【原文：China’s major technology stocks have been left behind in this year’s global frenzy over artificial intelligence, and a lack of demand for actual AI usage coupled with geopolitical pressures make it unlikely they can cash in anytime soon.】

item.title: 旧金山预计出现 8.76 亿美元预算赤字，警告将削减开支
item.description: 旧金山预计未来两个财政年度将出现 8.76 亿美元的预算缺口，这促使市长伦敦-布里德（London Breed）指示市政府各部门计划全面削减 15%的开支。【原文：San Francisco is projecting a $876 million budget shortfall over the next two fiscal years, prompting Mayor London Breed to instruct city departments to plan for 15% across-the-board spending cuts.】

item.title: 尽管中国近期大力推行经济刺激政策，但服务业扩张仍有所降温
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动的扩张幅度低于上个月，这表明尽管中国政府最近推出了刺激政策，但消费需求依然疲软。【原文：China’s services activity expanded less than a month earlier, a private survey showed, a sign that consumer demand remains sluggish despite Beijing’s recent stimulus push.】

item.title: 三菱公司因涉嫌中国金属诈骗损失 9000 万美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，三菱公司在中国的一家铜交易商涉嫌欺诈被揭露后，三菱公司蒙受了 9000 多万美元的损失。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. has suffered a loss of more than $90 million in China after uncovering suspected fraud by one of its copper traders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国内生产总值（GDP）增长不及预期，家庭紧缩开支
item.description: 在截至 9 月份的三个月里，澳大利亚的经济增长依然疲软，因为政府支出的激增只能勉强克服出口疲软和消费需求受到抑制的问题。【原文：Australia’s economic growth remained anemic in the three months through September, as a surge in government spending only just managed to overcome weak exports and restrained consumer demand.】

item.title: 韩国和法国局势动荡，刺激避险买盘，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 由于韩国和法国的政治动荡刺激了对避险资产的需求，黄金在周二上涨后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after rising on Tuesday as political turmoil in South Korea and France buoyed demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 比特币在 96,000 美元附近徘徊，加密货币等待特朗普的下一步行动
item.description: 由于预期美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将采取进一步措施支持比特币行业，加密货币投机者将比特币保持在 100,000 美元的标志性水平。【原文：Cryptocurrency speculators kept Bitcoin in sight of the landmark $100,000 level in anticipation of further steps to support the sector by US President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 泰国最大上市公司股价暴涨 165% 促使首席执行官与交易所召开会议
item.description: 泰国最大的上市公司将于下月与证券交易所会面，讨论其首席执行官认为 "不健康 "的股票飙升问题。【原文：Thailand’s biggest publicly listed company will meet with the bourse next month over its surging stock that its chief executive officer attributed as “not healthy.”】

item.title: 总统宣布短暂戒严后韩元上涨，股市下跌
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈在一场政治纷争中短暂宣布戒严，几小时后又采取行动取消了这一法令，韩国货币在周三早盘交易中走强，股市下跌。【原文：South Korea’s currency strengthened while its stocks fell in early trading Wednesday after President Yoon Suk Yeol briefly declared martial law amid a political tussle, before moving to rescind the decree just hours later.】

item.title: 乐天开始销售 2024 年第三次发行的美元债券
item.description: 乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc. ）开始销售其今年的第三笔美元债券，试图利用投资者对垃圾级债务的强劲需求，将美国的利差降至 2007 年以来的最低点。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. started marketing its third dollar bond of the year, seeking to take advantage of strong investor appetite for junk rated debt that drove US spreads to their lowest since 2007.】

item.title: 石油因欧佩克+协议进展和伊朗制裁而大幅上涨
item.description: 由于欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）在达成进一步推迟恢复被关闭供应的协议方面取得了进展，而且美国对伊朗原油实施了更多制裁，石油在经历了两周多来的最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest advance in more than two weeks as OPEC+ made progress toward a deal to delay further the restoration of shuttered supply, and the US imposed more sanctions on Iranian crude.】

item.title: 新西兰官员对第二家蛋鸡养殖场进行禽流感检测
item.description: 新西兰官员正在对奥塔哥南部地区的第二个蛋鸡养殖场进行调查，以确定是否存在禽流感病例。【原文：New Zealand officials are investigating a second egg farm in the southern region of Otago for potential cases of bird flu.】

item.title: 特拉华州法官拒绝马斯克为特斯拉发薪面临反弹
item.description: 特拉华州法官凯瑟琳-麦考密克（Kathaleen St. J. McCormick）第二次阻止了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）数十亿美元的特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：The social media blowback for Delaware Judge Kathaleen St. J. McCormick came fast and furious after she blocked Elon Musk’s multibillion-dollar Tesla Inc. payday for a second time, spotlighting the pressure that comes with ruling against the world’s richest person.】

item.title: 富国银行将出售旧金山总部，继续留在该市
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）正在寻求出售其位于旧金山的总部大楼，因为该公司正在向不到半英里外的其他办事处转移。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is looking to sell its headquarters building in San Francisco as it shifts to other offices less than a half-mile away.】

item.title: 缩减计划后，Microchip 暂停芯片法案申请
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国微芯科技公司（Microchip Technology Inc.【原文：Microchip Technology Inc. is pausing its application for US semiconductor subsidies, people familiar with the matter said, making it the first known company to step back from a program designed to revitalize American chipmaking.】

item.title: 韩国混乱局势为亚洲股市开盘定下谨慎基调：市场综述
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈做出了 40 多年来首次实施戒严令的令人震惊的决定，数小时后又改变了方向，令全球市场措手不及。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a mixed open after South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol’s shock decision to impose martial law for the first time in more than 40 years, only to reverse course hours later, caught global markets off guard.】

item.title: 加拿大矿业集团利用中国禁令反击特朗普关税
item.description: 中国禁止向美国出口稀有金属的举动凸显了矿产资源丰富的加拿大与其南部邻国开展贸易合作的必要性。【原文：China’s move to ban exports of rare metals to the US underscores the need for trade cooperation between mineral-rich Canada and its southern neighbor.】

item.title: 布莱恩-辛格曼减少在彼得-蒂尔的创始人基金的投资角色
item.description: 资深风险投资家布莱恩-辛格曼（Brian Singerman）在致公司有限合伙人的一封信中表示，他将从创始人基金（Founders Fund）的普通合伙人转型为荣誉合伙人，并将 "工作与生活的新平衡 "作为优先事项。【原文：Veteran venture capitalist Brian Singerman will transition to partner emeritus from general partner at Founders Fund, prioritizing “a new work-life balance,” according to a letter he sent to the firm’s limited partners.】

item.title: 力拓以 3.99 亿美元向住友出售铜矿股权
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）将以 3.99 亿美元的价格向日本住友金属矿业公司（Sumitomo Metal Mining Co.【原文：Rio Tinto Plc will sell a 30% stake in its Winu copper-gold project in Australia to Japan’s Sumitomo Metal Mining Co. for $399 million.】

item.title: 人民币交易员瞄准中国人民银行定盘价以衡量支持力度
item.description: 人民币兑美元汇率跌至一年来的最低点，这让人们重新关注中国管理货币的每日参考汇率，以衡量中国政府支持人民币的意愿。【原文：The yuan weakening to a one-year low against the dollar has returned the spotlight to China’s daily reference rate for the managed currency to gauge Beijing’s appetite to support it.】

item.title: 油砂碳捕集项目引起原住民关注
item.description: 一项旨在减少加拿大油砂排放的碳捕集与封存系统提案正受到当地土著社区的审查，他们要求对该项目进行影响评估。【原文：A proposed carbon-capture and storage system designed to slash emissions from Canada’s oil sands is drawing scrutiny from local Indigenous communities, who are requesting that the project be subject to an impact assessment.】

item.title: 比特币耶稣 "的律师称其税务案违反宪法
item.description: 被称为 "比特币耶稣 "的加密货币倡导者罗杰-维尔（Roger Ver）的律师敦促美国法官撤销对他的逃税起诉，这是他自 4 月份在西班牙被捕以来首次向法院提交文件。【原文：Lawyers for Roger Ver, the cryptocurrency advocate known as Bitcoin Jesus, urged a US judge to dismiss his tax evasion indictment in their first court filing since his April arrest in Spain.】

item.title: 债券交易员认为美国国债市场将延续反弹势头
item.description: 债券交易员认为美国国债市场将延续近期的升势，这表明他们相信收益率将继续从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大选获胜后触及的峰值回落。【原文：Bond traders are positioning for the US Treasuries market to extend its recent advance, showing confidence that yields will continue to pull back from the peaks hit after Donald Trump’s election victory.】

item.title: 人工智能计算需求推动 Marvell 业绩反弹
item.description: 芯片制造商 Marvell Technology Inc. 在发布了好于预期的业绩和乐观的盈利预测后，在尾盘交易中跳涨，原因是人工智能计算的需求。【原文：Marvell Technology Inc. jumped in late trading after the chipmaker delivered better-than-expected results and an upbeat earnings forecast, citing demand for artificial intelligence computing.】

item.title: Salesforce 公布强劲营收，人工智能有望带来增长
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 公布的季度营收超过了分析师的预期，这让投资者对该公司备受关注的人工智能产品战略将提升财务业绩抱有更大希望。【原文：Salesforce Inc. reported quarterly revenue that topped analysts’ estimates, boosting investor hopes that the company’s much-hyped strategy for artificial intelligence products will lift financial results.】
